help.title: P2C Bot Help Pages!
help.name: Power To Change Summer DG Bot
help.value:
Hello there! It's me, {insert creative name}! I'm a mutli-purpose bot that can do random stuff!
React with the arrows to see the commands!
You can also use commands in a DM channel with the bot!

If you are still confused after reading this guide or want to talk DM pigpigchui#0753]

help.title: Help Commands
help.name: `{prefix}bible [phrase, book, verse, etc...]`
help.value:
Use {prefix}bible ***phrase, book, verse, etc...*** to search Bible Gateway
Example:
{prefix}bible John 3:16
